pages.text:
About Us
OUTshine LGBTQ+ Film Festival: Celebrating Cinema, Diversity & Community
The
OUTshine LGBTQ+ Film Festival
is South Florida’s premier LGBTQ+ cultural arts event, originating from the
Miami Gay & Lesbian Film Festival
(1998) and the
Fort Lauderdale Gay & Lesbian Film Festival
(2008). These two iconic festivals merged under one dynamic brand, reflecting our vibrant, multicultural audience and international recognition.
As a critically acclaimed platform, OUTshine is more than just a film festival—it’s an immersive experience designed to
inspire, entertain, and educate
. Our mission is to foster community and celebrate LGBTQ+ stories through diverse films, videos, and media that explore historical and contemporary perspectives.
Experience OUTshine in 2025
Spring Edition
: April 17 – 27
OUTshine At Home
: April 28 – May 4
Fall Edition
: October 16 – 26
OUTshine At Home
: October 27 – November 2
Beyond our flagship festivals,
OUTshine is a year-round cultural event
featuring:
Monthly screenings
, including the popular
Cocktails & Cinema™
series
Exclusive sneak-peek events
of upcoming films
OUTshine At-Home
, a virtual programming experience bringing LGBTQ+ cinema to audiences across Florida
Join us in celebrating
bold storytelling, diverse voices, and unforgettable cinematic moments.
Be part of the
OUTrageous, OUTspoken, and OUTstanding
experience that is OUTshine LGBTQ+ Film Festival!
Get tickets
OUTshine Film Festival is a d/b/a of the Miami Gay & Lesbian Film Festival, a 501(c)(3) Not-for-Profit.
A copy of the official registration and financial information may be obtained from the Division of Consumer Services of Florida by calling toll-free within the state to 1-800-HELP-FLA(435-7352) or by visiting
www.FloridaConsumerHelp.com
. Registration does not imply endorsement, approval, or recommendation by the State.
You can download our IRS 501(c)(3) determination letter
here
, and our tax-exempt certificate
here
.
Board of Directors and Staff are listed under
Festival Team
Contact Us
OUTshine Film Festival
PO Box 530280
Miami, FL 33153-0280
United States
Tel: 305-849-7010
customerservice@outshinefilm.com

Membership
Members can enjoy a full year of queer cinema while supporting the arts in South Florida. All members regardless of level are eligible to a tax deduction of 75% of their membership cost. Additional Membership Benefits and Pricing details below.
A copy of the official registration and financial information may be obtained from the Division of Consumer Services of Florida by calling toll-free within the state to 1-800-HELP-FLA(435-7352) or by visiting www.FloridaConsumerHelp.com. Registration does not imply endorsement, approval, or recommendation by the State.
Become a Member
Spring Passes
SPRING SEASON ALL‑ACCESS PASS
$600
(1) Ticket to ALL Festival Films & Events
25% OFF All Additional General Admission Tickets
Membership Line for Priority Seating
Upgradeable to Producer Circle
SPRING PARTY PASS
$250
(1) Opening Night Film & Party Ticket
(1) Centerpiece Film & Party Ticket
(1) Closing Night Film & Party Ticket
(2) Spotlight Film & Event Tickets
25% OFF All Additional General Admission Tickets
Membership Line for Priority Seating
Buy Passes
Producers Circle Membership
As a non-profit organization with a lean budget we count on the support of Producer's Circle contributions to continue to serve our community. Producer's Circle contributions represent 25% of the Film Festival operating capital and are an essential component in the festival's continued success.
Studio Head
$10,000
(Individual or Couple)
8 VIP Studio Head passes
to all festival events including Miami, Fort Lauderdale, and Cocktails & Cinema™ (no additional tickets required)
8 tickets to Opening Film and Gala
, with access to special VIP balcony seating area (Miami only)
8 tickets to Centerpiece Film and Gala
8 tickets to Closing Film and Gala
, with access to special VIP balcony seating area (Miami only)
VIP entrance
priority to all festival events, with
4 reserved seats at all screenings
Name listed
at Studio Head level in Film Festival programs and on official websites (Year Round)
Name on exclusive screen
slide before every screening during the Film Festivals & Cocktails & Cinema™ Screenings
Special on stage recognition
before Opening Night Films
Advanced mailing of Film Festival programs
, which include film titles and schedule, before release to general public
Eligibility for 4 additional tickets per film at
specially discounted price
Monthly payment
option available

Become a Member
General Membership
Sign up as a member and have the time of your life! Expect more of everything you've enjoyed in the past... more glamorous gala parties, premieres of the best international and U.S. independent films, exclusive films for women, and expanded programming in Broward. Your membership will be active for a full year of privileges and benefits as of the date you join.
Glam Membership Pass
$90
OUTshine Membership
2 Film Tickets
2 Films at Home (Virtual)
$2 OFF Additional General Admission Tickets
Membership Line for Priority Seating
